nodes.text: Drilling Platform K'wanna was a mining platform attached to the southern side of the Cartel mining mesa on the planet Makeb. One of six mining platforms attached to the mesa by the Hutt Cartel, the platform used a mining laser to drill into the planet's core for isotope-5. During the conflict, Galactic Republic forces attacked the platform and shut down the laser to halt its damaging of the planet's core.

Drilling Platform K'wanna was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic along with the rest of the planet Makeb in the 2013 Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel.
